dublin_core.dcvalue: A Web based collaboration tool was developed for ophthalmologists called yenet A feasibility study was performed in 2000 The system was ready to use in 2001 but the usage of the system was disappointing compared to the enthusiasm expressed in the feasibility study In order to identify facilitators and barriers for usage of the system we performed a qualitative study Nineteen ophthalmologists from different parts of Norway who had been using the system but to a varying degree were interviewed The study revealed that a single common solution is not appropriate for the ophthalmology community as a whole It also revealed that colleagues from abroad should be allowed to use the system in order for it to act as a tool for collaboration and seeking advice in complex medical problem solving
Success and failure in Web-based medical collaboration.
